data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Milan in the half of Sampdoria.
Goal! Milan have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
Ante Rebic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, In Genoa Milan drive forward through Theo Hernandez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Davide Calabria gets his shot on target but fails to score for Milan.
In the minute 9, Sampdoriaâ€™s Wladimiro Falcone is on his feet again at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Fabrizio Pasqua waits before resuming play because Wladimiro Falcone for Sampdoria is still down.
Karol Linetty for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Milan's Ante Rebic is on target but unsuccessful.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 13, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sampdoria are pushing forward but Jakub Jankto's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria are coming forward and Fabio Depaoli gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Luigi Ferraris, Milan are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 19, Important block from the Milan defence as Jakub Jankto fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Milan a goal kick.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Davide Calabria.
Davide Calabria for Milan is back on the field again.
Milan's Ante Rebic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Milan.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Gaston Ramirez for Sampdoria drives towards goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria are caught offside.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Milan's half.
In the minute 29, Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Milan's Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 31, Matteo Gabbia of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 36, Bartosz Bereszynski (Sampdoria) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Genoa Milan attack through Hakan Calhanoglu. The finish is off target, however.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Milan attack through Alexis Saelemaekers. The finish is off target, however.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Sampdoria advance rapidly upfield but Fabrizio Pasqua blows for offside.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Milan.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Milan a goal kick.
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Milan.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The first-half is over.
Gaston Ramirez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 45, At Luigi Ferraris, Ante Rebic for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Gonzalo Maroni is replacing Gaston Ramirez for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Mehdi Leris is on a sub for Fabio Depaoli for Sampdoria.
In the minute 46, Rafael Leao is replacing Ante Rebic for the away team.
Sampdoria's Mehdi Leris misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 48, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Milan's half.
Milan have a goal kick.
Sampdoria drives forward and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Omar Colley (Sampdoria) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 52, Goal! Hakan Calhanoglu extends Milan's lead to 0-2.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic with an assist there.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Milan take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
That's a fine assist from Hakan Calhanoglu.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 60, Fabio Quagliarella gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sampdoria.
Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a second substitution, with Giacomo Bonaventura replacing Hakan Calhanoglu.
The away team have replaced Davide Calabria with Samu Castillejo. This is the third substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Genoa.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
Gonzalo Maroni of Sampdoria smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Milan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Milan push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Giacomo Bonaventura gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sampdoria defence.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Throw-in for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 69, Milan pushes forward through Franck Kessie, whose finish on goal is saved.
Milan's Rafael Leao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Sampdoria's Jakub Jankto breaks free at Luigi Ferraris. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Sampdoria make their third substitution with Andrea Bertolacci replacing Karol Linetty.
In the minute 74, Claudio Ranieri is making the team's fourth substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Manolo Gabbiadini replacing Fabio Quagliarella.
Kristoffer Askildsen is replacing Ronaldo Vieira for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 75, Giacomo Bonaventura for Milan is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Penalty! Fabrizio Pasqua points to the spot, great chance for Sampdoria...
In the minute 78, A massive blow for Sampdoria as Gonzalo Maroni misses from the spot.
Mehdi Leris for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
In the minute 79, The away team have replaced Zlatan Ibrahimovic with Lucas Paqueta. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
Stefano Pioli (Milan) is making a fifth substitution, with Lucas Biglia replacing Franck Kessie.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Milan at Luigi Ferraris.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Milan throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 84, Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milan pushes forward through Giacomo Bonaventura, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Sampdoria just outside Milan's area.
In the minute 86, In Genoa, Manolo Gabbiadini of Sampdoria is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Milan.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 87, Goal! Kristoffer Askildsen pulls one back to make it 1-3.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Milan.
Milan's Samu Castillejo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
In the minute 89, Milan have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
In Genoa, Milan push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
At Luigi Ferraris the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Milan's Samu Castillejo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
Milan have a goal kick.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Ball safe as Milan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fabrizio Pasqua blows to end the match. The final score is 1-4.
Great finish from Rafael Leao to give Milan a 1-4 lead.
Great play from Giacomo Bonaventura to set up the goal.
